mapper.sql: specs_id as specsId , storage_status as storageStatus , as , rmt_pkg_id as rmtPkgId , sls_pmtn_id as slsPmtnId , pro_name as proName , b_id as bId , order_pkg_code as orderPkgCode , price_agency_id as priceAgencyId , capacity as capacity , update_time as updateTime , parent_id_path as parentIdPath , bd_no as bdNo , supplier_id as supplierId , damage_bd_id as damageBdId , rest_name as restName , pic as pic , quantity as quantity , category_id as categoryId , update_by as updateBy , size as size , is_syn as isSyn , supplier_name as supplierName , discount as discount , number_of_broken as numberOfBroken , specs_name as specsName , rest_id as restId , volume as volume , appl_desc as applDesc , pri_cat_line_id as priCatLineId , bar_code as barCode , rmt_detail_id as rmtDetailId , create_by as createBy , amount_paid as amountPaid , order_pkg_id as orderPkgId , rmt_status as rmtStatus , parent_name_path as parentNamePath , cart_item_id as cartItemId , syn_version as synVersion , create_time as createTime , base_pro_no as baseProNo , price as price , is_codeless as isCodeless , strategy_desc as strategyDesc , category_name as categoryName , privilege as privilege , subtotal as subtotal , version as version , bd_id as bdId , price_agency_name as priceAgencyName , start_point_qyt as startPointQyt , base_pro_id as baseProId , pro_color_no as proColorNo , pro_desc as proDesc , pro_id as proId , target_client as targetClient
mapper.insert:
insert into b2b_order_item( specs_id ,
storage_status ,
,

pro_name ,
b_id ,
order_pkg_code ,
price_agency_id ,
capacity ,

specs_name ,
rest_id ,
volume ,

create_by ,

rmt_status ,

version ,

start_point_qyt ,

pro_id ,

) values ( #\{specsId \} , #\{storageStatus \} , #\{ \} , #\{rmtPkgId \} , #\{slsPmtnId \} , #\{proName \} , #\{bId \} , #\{orderPkgCode \} , #\{priceAgencyId \} , #\{capacity \} , #\{updateTime \} , #\{parentIdPath \} , #\{bdNo \} , #\{supplierId \} , #\{damageBdId \} , #\{restName \} , #\{pic \} , #\{quantity \} , #\{categoryId \} , #\{updateBy \} , #\{size \} , #\{isSyn \} , #\{supplierName \} , #\{discount \} , #\{numberOfBroken \} , #\{specsName \} , #\{restId \} , #\{volume \} , #\{applDesc \} , #\{priCatLineId \} , #\{barCode \} , #\{rmtDetailId \} , #\{createBy \} , #\{amountPaid \} , #\{orderPkgId \} , #\{rmtStatus \} , #\{parentNamePath \} , #\{cartItemId \} , #\{synVersion \} , #\{createTime \} , #\{baseProNo \} , #\{price \} , #\{isCodeless \} , #\{strategyDesc \} , #\{categoryName \} , #\{privilege \} , #\{subtotal \} , #\{version \} , #\{bdId \} , #\{priceAgencyName \} , #\{startPointQyt \} , #\{baseProId \} , #\{proColorNo \} , #\{proDesc \} , #\{proId \} , #\{targetClient \} )
